name: QCertified
tag_list: used-cars, cars, sales, internet-sale, certified, pre-owned
overview:
QCertified.com is a new offering from Resource Automotive, a global pioneer in automotive finance services since 1964. QCertified.com’s mission is to provide an easily accessible, easily searchable hand-picked database of pristine certified pre-owned vehicles from select partnered dealerships across the United States.

All QCertified vehicles must undergo a rigorous certification process to be featured on QCertified.com, including a detailed 128-point safety inspection performed by ASE Certified Technicians and a comprehensive vehicle history evaluation provided by Experian Automotive. Once each vehicle passes “QCertification,” it is listed on QCertified.com and added to the website’s searchable database. QCertified aims to make the used car buying process simpler and less anxiety-ridden by offering search options on both the PC and on mobile platforms. QCertified’s iPhone/iPod Touch app is live and Android/Blackberry versions are on the way.

Additionally, all QCertified vehicles ship with a QUltimate Limited Powertrain Warranty and a one-year membership to Road America’s Auto Assist program which covers roadside assistance, towing, emergency travel expense reimbursement, and more.

For customers, QCertified offers a simple way to shop with confidence for used vehicles. For dealerships, QCertified serves as a way to engage new customers and provides an opportunity to differentiate from competitors in an over-crowded marketplace. Only the most reputable dealers in good standing with their manufacturer are considered.

external_links.title: Press Release - Resource Automotive Announces Exclusive Certified Used Vehicle Website
